message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $13,000.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $11,500 is a little too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $12,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested.
Hi Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,250. I hope we can come to an agreement.
